entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
